mapper.select: select b.bid_id as id, b.price, b.bid_time, b.is_success, u.id as user_id, i.item_id as item_id from Bid b left join User u on b.user_id = u.id left join Item i on b.item_id = i.item_id
mapper.insert: insert into Bid(item_id, user_id, price, bid_time, is_success) values (#{itemId}, #{userId}, #{price}, #{bidTime}, #{isSuccess})
mapper.select: select max(b.price) as price from Bid b group by b.item_id having b.item_id = #{itemId}

select b.bid_id as id, b.price, b.bid_time, b.is_success, u.id as user_id, i.item_id as item_id from Bid b left join User u on b.user_id = u.id left join Item i on b.item_id = i.item_id where b.bid_id = #{bidId}
select b.price, u.id as userId, b.bid_id as bidId from Bid b left join User u on b.user_id = u.id where b.item_id = #{itemId} order by b.price

select i.item_id as itemId, i.name as name, img.url as imgUrl, d.invoice_number as invoiceNumber, d.code as deliveryCode, b.price as price, b.bid_time as bidTime, c.name as customsName from Item i left join Customs c on i.customs_id = c.id left join Bid b on i.item_id = b.item_id left join Delivery d on i.item_id = d.item_id left join (select item_id, url from Image where seq = 0) img on i.item_id = img.item_id where b.is_success = 1 and b.user_id = #{id} limit #{pageable.pageSize} offset #{pageable.offset}

with bidRank as (select b.*, row_number() over (partition by b.item_id order by b.price desc) as rn from Bid b where item_id in (select item_id from Item where status = 'CLOSED' and end_time between now - interval 5 minute and now + interval 5 minute)) select b.price, b.name, i.url, u.email from Image i join bidRank b on i.item_id = b.item_id and i.seq = 0 and rn = 1 left join User u on b.user_id = u.id

select i.url as itemImage, item.name as itemName, item.end_time as selectedTime, item.price from Image i join (select i.item_id, i.name, i.end_time, b.price from Item i join Bid b on i.item_id = b.item_id and b.user_id = #{id} and b.is_success = 1 and bid_id not in (select bid_id from Payment where user_id = #{id})) as item on i.item_id = item.item_id and i.seq = 0
